message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its quality and functionality, I would like to propose an initial price of $200. Would you be interested in discussing this further?

Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer and understand the value of the product. However, I am looking for a more affordable option. I am willing to pay up to $150 for the product. Let me know if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To find a middle ground, I would like to propose a price of $175 for the product. This still allows us to cover the costs while making it more accessible for you. I hope this proposal works for you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to accommodate my budget. I would like to counter with a price of $160 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. After considering your proposal, I would like to suggest a price of $165 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while being more flexible with your budget. I hope this helps us move forward towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
I see, Alice. I am willing to consider your latest proposal. However, I would like to counter with a price of $162 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I propose a final price of $163 for the product. This price allows us to cover our costs and maintain a reasonable profit margin. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can finalize the transaction.
Thank you for your final proposal, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I am willing to agree on a price of $161 for the product. I hope this helps us conclude our negotiations.
